item.title: Styles
item.description: You can style your Doks site with custom CSS files or use the Hyas Bootstrap plugin. Custom CSS Customize the styles applied to your Doks site by providing additional CSS files to modify or extend Doks’ default styles. Custom variables Add custom CSS or SCSS variables to assets/scss/common/_variables-custom.scss. For example, you could set a text size variable: :root { --doks-text-lg: 1.5rem; } Custom styles Add custom SCSS or CSS to assets/scss/common/_custom.
